pathGuide.title: How to Run the Command
pathGuide.description: Steps to execute the generated FFmpeg command in your terminal
pathGuide.step1: Copy the generated command using the Copy button
pathGuide.step3: Navigate to the folder containing your files:
pathGuide.step4: Paste the copied command and press Enter
pathGuide.tipMac: Right-click folder in Finder → 'New Terminal Tab at Folder'
pathGuide.tipWindows: Type 'cmd' in Explorer's address bar and press Enter
pathGuide.tipLinux: Right-click folder in file manager → 'Open in Terminal'
pathGuide.warning: Due to browser security restrictions, the full file path cannot be obtained. Commands are generated with filenames only, so please run them in the directory where your files are located.
